document.full_text: alcatel-lucent may dispose of the part of the company that sells phones and telecom gear to corporate clients, three people familiar with the matter said, though it was not clear if alcatel had mandated advisers.
document.title: alcatel mulls corporate telecom gear unit sale: sources
lines_and_colors: alcatel-lucent may dispose of the part of the company that sells phones and telecom gear to corporate clients, three people familiar with the matter said, though it was not clear if alcatel had mandated advisers.
